recipe.title: Bibb Lettuce and Celery-Leaf Salad
ingredients: 2 lb Bibb lettuce (10 small heads), leaves separated
2 cups celery leaves (from 2 bunches celery; both top leaves and inner leaves from tender pale ribs)
instructions: Whisk together vinegar, shallot, salt, and pepper in a small bowl, then add oils in a slow stream, whisking until emulsified. Toss lettuce and celery leaves with just enough vinaigrette to coat in a large bowl.
